member.name: M:JN.ApiDemo.Identity.Helpers.IdentityServiceHelpers.ResetLockout(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UserManager{JN.ApiDemo.Identity.Domain.ApplicationUser},JN.ApiDemo.Identity.Domain.ApplicationUser)
member.summary: Used to reset a user's lockout count. Based on https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/blob/v2.2.2/src/Identity/Core/src/SignInManager.cs
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation, containing the of the operation.
